Reviews.Title: Save you rmoney
Reviews.Author: Landrik
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter for her birthday. It does not save the pictures when you turn it off. It also killed brand new batteries with in a couple of hours, and she wasn't using it the whole time. The pictures also look horrible, the color is way off. Don not buy this camera, its a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: LB Gillooly
Reviews.Content: We made several attempts at getting this to work with no success. It has a small outdated screen even if it did work.

Reviews.Title: Camera was Purchased as a CHRISTMAS GIFT
Reviews.Author: Allan Northington
Reviews.Content: My Niece I have given it too loves it. This is her try out camera she shows she can take care of it her next one will have more mega pixels.
